item.title: California Wonder
item.description: Blocky and wide, with crisp, thick walls and sweet taste. Ideal for stuffing, slicing into rings for dips and salad toppings, and chopping into crisp bite-sized nibbles. Delicious raw, stuffed and baked, stir-fried or grilled.
